title: I bought RP while the RP server was down
body: Help riot I don't understand I didn't read that exclamation mark about the RP server down and I bought a $25 card purchased said congratulations and all but I Didn't get RP.. Also I checked my purchases it didn't come up ?? But I tried the code again and a message came up error.. What happens now?? Please link me something ..

replies.body:
Hey there,

You'll have to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support to have them check out the situation and add the RP to your account manually.

Please note, support is currently backlogged and requests could take up to 48 hours (Or longer) for an initial response.
Well if you get me the link to player support I will message them but all i see is technical diffculty and nothing to say about RP

Hey there,

The link provided is to the page to submit a ticket, please select **I am having technical issues** or **I have a question about League of Legends/Riot Games** both will be fine and your ticket will be forwarded to billing by Player Support.

I read it all but riot didnt explain how Prepaid cards didnt work either so if you did it by a prepaid card then we are the same riot please fix i brought two $10 RP cards so $20 which means I should have 2200 but no I have not got them I got the congratulations for redeemeding it but Still have nothing ? Please respond to help solve this.
